charaepi_ch0089_10_n/2301_1101_0100_20:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] found N and Rosa
talking to each other in a town of windmills.
charaepi_ch0089_10_n/2301_1201_0200_10: I see... But if that’s the case...
charaepi_ch0089_10_n/2301_0302_0600_10:
You both have serious looks on
your faces.
charaepi_ch0089_10_n/2301_0402_0700_10: Oh, do we look that troubled?
charaepi_ch0089_10_n/2301_1201_0800_10:
Rosa and I were talking about the legendary story
of Kyurem.
charaepi_ch0089_10_n/2301_1201_0900_10:
An old lady from Lacunosa Town in Unova told
me this story...
charaepi_ch0089_10_n/2301_1201_1000_10:
There’s a big hole called the Giant Chasm just
next to Lacunosa Town...
charaepi_ch0089_10_n/2301_1201_1100_10:
According to legend, a meteorite fell from the sky,
and that’s what created it.
charaepi_ch0089_10_n/2301_1201_1200_10: Inside the meteorite was a terrifying Pokémon...
charaepi_ch0089_10_n/2301_1201_1300_10:
At night, that Pokémon would kidnap people
and Pokémon, then eat them.
charaepi_ch0089_10_n/2301_1201_1400_10: Apparently, that terrifying Pokémon was Kyurem.
charaepi_ch0089_10_n/2301_1201_1500_10: But according to the creation myth of Unova...
charaepi_ch0089_10_n/2301_1201_1600_10:
Kyurem is what remains of the body of what used
to be a single Pokémon that split into Reshiram
and Zekrom.
charaepi_ch0089_10_n/2301_1201_1700_10: Well, it does contradict the other story...
charaepi_ch0089_10_n/2301_1201_1900_10:
But... The story of the Giant Chasm being created
by a meteorite does make sense, too.
charaepi_ch0089_10_n/2301_1201_2000_10:
Some of the Pokémon that live in the area are said
to be from outer space.
charaepi_ch0089_10_n/2301_1201_2100_10:
That reminds me... Lunatone, Solrock, and Clefairy
were there!
charaepi_ch0089_10_n/2301_1201_2200_10:
It’s true that Kyurem can fuse with Zekrom and
Reshiram, so...
charaepi_ch0089_10_n/2301_1201_2300_10:
There seems to be no doubt that they’re
related, too...
charaepi_ch0089_10_n/2301_1201_2400_10:
I tried asking Kyurem to see if I could learn
anything from it...
charaepi_ch0089_10_n/2301_1201_2500_10:
But it seems like it’s not too sure where it came
from, either.
charaepi_ch0089_10_n/2301_0301_2700_10: I think Zekrom also came from space.
charaepi_ch0089_10_n/2301_0402_3100_10: I see. That’s one way of interpreting it.
charaepi_ch0089_10_n/2301_1201_3200_10:
We don’t really know what the truth is, at least
for now.
charaepi_ch0089_10_n/2301_1201_3300_10:
But... This Kyurem that’s standing right in front
of us...
charaepi_ch0089_10_n/2301_1201_3400_10:
It’s not a terrifying monster, like the one depicted
in the legend from Lacunosa Town.
charaepi_ch0089_10_n/2301_1201_3500_10:
It’s a kindhearted friend who is willing to help
both you and me.
charaepi_ch0089_10_n/2301_1201_3600_10: Yeah! I agree with you, N!
charaepi_ch0089_10_n/2301_1201_3700_10:
If we want to travel the world and fill it with
better formulas...
charaepi_ch0089_10_n/2301_1201_3800_10:
We need to get rid of the misunderstandings
and misinterpretations people have about
these Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0089_10_n/2301_1201_3900_10:
That may be why I’m here...to help find the truth
behind such Pokémon!
